title: MARS+ Implementation from SD-(W)LAN Bundles
description:
Description
Overview price model SDWLAN Bundles

Business Scope:
As a user of PANDA within the PLAN Process, I would like to have an overview about the network and the products a customer has within its networks in form of an inventory view so that I get an general overview about the customer's SDx inventories.
Possible scenarios include a stand alone inventory of SDWAN CSO, SDWAN MIST SSR/SRX, SDWLAN MIST, as well as a mixed inventory of SDWLAN MIST and SDWAN MIST SSR/SRX.
Additionally, existing network via add new site shell be possible for SDWLAN via PIM services
acceptance_criteria: SDWLAN is available in all Microservices
new product ist available within PCM
Bundles are shown within PIM UI
